title: Trust Test
desc:
Post 437
- Try to form an alliance with the next player. If they play a <:green:1106234108042031166> card, they draw 3 cards but the alliance is solidified. They now win if you win and vice versa. You can also choose a new position in the turn order. If they play a <:red:1106234051129507932> card, you draw 6 cards.
